column3:
â€œStrain: Sweet Kush (Sweet Tooth / OG Kush cross -- this one was a Sativa leaning Hybrid)
THC: 21.67%
CBD: 0.23
Grower: LTRMN
Location found: KaLeafa
Date purchased: 3.29.16 
Price: $8.00/g
Weight: 1.1g
Method of Consumption: Herb Iron and small bong 
Smell: When the scissors cut through the bud I smelled a sweet, damp earthy, lemony zest. It reminds me of the hard to place tastes and smells of the Afghani and Nepales...â€

â€œSweet Kush = [Sweet Tooth x OG Kush]  ..'excellent' is the only way to describe it...from culture magazine:  Far from the Hindu Kush Mountains, this Sweet Tooth and OG Kush cross smokes like a million-dollar cut. Intense citrus notes like a smashed-up Lemonhead waft up strongly; your nose will want to pucker instead of your mouth. After testing out the sample from Denverâ€™s Patients Plus, we noticed that the bowl burn...â€

â€œWonderful flavor and very smooth. The high comes quickly and lets you know that its there. I really enjoyed the ride. Take it easy when smoking large amounts. This is an experienced smoker's strain.â€
â€œStarts off all talkative and giggly then melts into a contemplative spacey high. Then you melt into the couch and become a star in the night sky.â€

â€œAbsolutely great cross breed. Fractured my shoulder and this weed does so much more for me than Advil or Tylenol.  Makes the pain go away, while allowing your mind to drift free and become extremely creative. Looked at the stars after smoking a few dubs and life was absolutely amazing.â€

â€œIt was great for relaxing before bed. I had no muscle tension in my legs like I usually get before bed. I had 2 BIG bowls full in a water pipe and I was out like a light! Thanks sweet kush for being so.... Sweet :Pâ€
â€œWow. Smoked this and had sex for three hours. The body high is so nice.â€

â€œWow!  One of my top 5 right now.  Sweet Kush is a great euphoric, relaxing high.  How can you not feel happy and uplifted?  Giant nugs, great taste, great relaxing and euphoric feeling.... what's not to love?â€

â€œShared a bowl with one of my friends on my Sherlock pipe and felt it almost immediately. It has an amazing smell and a great high, relaxes your whole body but doesnâ€™t make you tired, really euphoric. I have major depressive disorder and after smoking this I was really talkative and couldnâ€™t stop laughing at first. All in all itâ€™s a great strain and I definitely recommend it.â€
â€œAmazingly for stress and pain. Like the way I feel. Like the relaxation and the laughing. Excellent for sex.â€

â€œThis is fast becoming one of my favorite strains for enjoyment.  The pain relief and general sense of well being are even, long lasting, and consistent with every use.   While Sweet Kush would be an excellent choice for mild to moderate pain/nausea, my #1 recommendation would be for stress.  Sweet Kush truly just relaxes the mind and melts away tension.â€
â€œI read the first guy's comments where he says it takes you to a different planet and I got this in response.  I have to say I couldn't agree with him more as I feel that way right now.â€

â€œLucky enough to get some of this from Reliable Medical Services #2.

Just 2 hits on the mini-bubbler and I was able to sit at my system for 2 hours straight getting work done. Usually I can do 30 minutes at a time, I blew out both knee's and my back.

I hope the keep this in stockâ€

â€œ3 rips off a bong and i was space traveling. lol

10/10 stars forget 5/5â€
â€œI love this hybrid blend. Very smooth, tasty, and does exactly what it says. I'm a seasoned" smoker and this one definitely packed a punch
column4: so to speak. I would recommend this for anyone medicating for depression or stress.â€"

column3: â€œTaste super sweet, really tasty! Not as strong as I thought it would be. But nice for a temporary head highâ€
â€œStrong head high. One hit and you feel it". The high lasts long. Comes in popcorn size nugs. Tastes like wild honey with a spicy kick.â€"

â€œI really enjoyed this medicine. It worked wonders on my busted up back. it seemed to calm the manic episodes, and I have only had one seizure within the past 10 days. Not bad! The Sweet Kush had a tangy flavor, which was pleasing to the senses. I am so psyched about it, that I am going to go and relieve the pain, which is beginning to form in my back. this batch is especially pleasing to the senses, and works wonderf...â€

â€œLong lasting, heavy, couch-locking buzz that gives you the munches for sweet food. Starts out cerebral and then works its way down. Best used a couple hours before bed. I woke up the next morning feeling completely renewed. Great for pain, insomnia and appetite.â€
â€œThis shit makes you gone as fuck. Its like your on a different planetâ€
â€œModerately quick on the come on, very nice body buzz but an energetic mind that also seems relaxed, at the same time. Lasted a good while on a single bowl. Very pleasant aroma and flavor.â€

â€œSweet Smell, Dank, little Sticky,Good Looking a lot of Orange hairs.
My friend and me just got it first hits of it it was good , but our bong was dirty so after we cleaned it i packed the bowl and took a hit it immedatly hit my eyes.â€

â€œVery smooth smoke. 4/5 stars. Burns nicely in a wrap as well as out of the bowl, nice sized nugs green as can be. Gave me effects within 5 minutes of smoking. Very cerebral at first with a body stone finish. Very fun strain to unwind for the day. Good for relaxing the night before a big interview or exam. Space out and enjoy broh!â€

â€œTried this in Vape Cartridge from Curaleaf in Orlando. This is the best strain I've had from them. I was expecting to get couch lock after awhile but actually went the other way and was energized. There is a little anxiety with...â€

â€œI think it's an amazing strain! I struggle with depression and I only use cannabis to fight it. So I'm always look for a strain that can keep me happy. This strain definitely does the trick! That's the only reason for me its not a 5 star.â€
